release.action: Rings logs will be extracted from the directory trees created after their decompression.
First version of ELK Stack implementation put in place to support IMG metrics.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 8.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Using TLS v1.2 to avoid handshake issues.
A log will be deleted after downloading if it is empty.
ReadWriter utility will now flush more reliably.
Added Processor to filter out requests from Xymon (and similar monitors) that produce requests with a missing client IP.
Added Processor to filter out proxy IPs from client IP details in logs.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 7.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added profiles to handle all PDS log sources.
Automated downloading and renaming of reports.
Added date filter to determine dates in log filenames in almost every format.
Added command line flags to search nodes and profiles assigned to nodes.
Overhauled reading and writing of log files during processing to avoid issues caused when exceeding memory allowance.
Tweak how EN FTP logs are processed to provide more accurate reports of which tools are downloaded.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated Windows System Properties Install Guide.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the JRE requirement to 1.7 in the Installation document.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 6.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Developed Processing component for non-Apache combined logs.
Defined configurations for all nodes log sources.
Developed Processor to handle xferlog and NcFTP formats.
Added a script to rename monthly reports.
Logs are now not processed if their processed version already exists in the final directory.
HTTP log puller will ignore links to non-files.
Sawmill copy scripts can no longer copy over contents of front-end Sawmill DB.
Report Service will now exit if it cannot obtain the lock on log files.
Updated test constants for imaging node due to machine upgrade.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 5.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added CLI option to specify a date range to download.
Added a feature to remove logs that are over 1 year old.
Added a wrapper for the Sawmill CLI.
Resolved issue where the report-manager hangs when generating multiple reports.
Added the report generation flag for domain reports.
Modified the report output path for consistency and to eliminate naming collisions.
Added an echo command to the auto-generated script for Sawmill to enable debugging.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 5.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Created new staging command-line variable to allow specification of a staging directory to be fed into the PushPull API. Removed database.properties because it was leftover from rs-update and is no longer needed. Updated environment.properties with updated paths. Had to update the oodt-version Maven variable to an actual value because it was not picking it up from parent.

Added classes to pull files using SFTP, FTP, and HTTP protocols. One can specify the details for these connections using simple properties files. Added a command-line flag to filter which nodes are processed.

release.description: This release of the Report Service Manager is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Basically rewrote the software to include an interface to Apache PushPull and streamlined the architecture for the report service. Includes updates to PushPull configurations for the nodes we have information on, an updated Launcher for the CLI, and accompanying units tests for most of the PushPull functionality.
Updated Unix shell script and Windows batch file to provide a more user friendly message when JAVA_HOME is not set in the environment.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the software and changed a few of the references to the old CGI installation.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated releases 3.0.0 and 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.

This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Initial capabilities for transferring logs and updating the Sawmill database.
